overview.name: Walt Disney Headquarters.
overview.description: In the Disney Headquarters, located in the heart of New York City, most of the daily administrative operations happen here. Running of the streaming service as well as other Disney owned sites such as Hulu and ABC. These headquarters primearily house significant board meetings and production conferences about future Disney Plus content. It is the central hub for all things Disney.

overview.name: Disney Tech Bay Area
overview.description: The Bay Area site is a Tech Site that functions slightly as a data center for Disney as they do not have their own specific data cites. Located in Silicon Valley it is where the tech segments come from in terms of Disney.

overview.name: Disney Tech Los Angeles
overview.description: A site where other Disney technical production related indeveors occur, such as Animation Studios and original content for the Disney Plus Platform.

overview.name: Disney Media and Entertainment Distrubution
overview.description: Primeraily a Data center for disney where analytics and data are sourced. Many job oppirtunities are houses here for those both skilled in business administration as well as the sciences and engineering. Opportunities such as data analysts and project managers are avaliable for skilled persons to gather data on Disney content and track its growth as well as produce content for the public to see and get excited about in terms of new Disney projects.

overview.name: Walt Disney Studios
overview.description: The Walt Disney Studio space is ultimatley a lot where many Disney Plus content is filmed. Movies and television shows under Disney are curated in these studios, as they are filled with props and sets that have created Disney Magic for people all around the world. People go tour these studios as well as some famous sets still remain for people to expieirence.

location.address: 500 S Buena Vista St, Burbank, CA 91521

overview.name: Disney Animation Studios
overview.description: Disney Plus consists of a large percentage of animated content, and it is also what Disney thrives on as a company, welcoming people of all ages into the magical world that is Disney. At the Walt Disney Animation Studios, editors, animators, artists, actors, producers, writers, and directors gather and create animated films, shorts, and shows that will and have aired on Disney Plus.

overview.name: Pixar Animation Studios
overview.description: Pixar, another branch of Disneys Animated Studios, is described as a computer animation studio that specializes in Feature Films for Disney Plus. On the streaming site, there is a great deal of Pixar films and shorts that are highly acclaimed, such as the Oscar Winning film "Soul". Pixar films are created here due to the help of animators, writers, voice actors, artists, and producers alike.

location.address: Pixar Animation Studios 1200 Park Avenue Emeryville, California 94608
